item.title: yum commands
item.description: Equivalent of apt-get update yum check-update List configured (enabled) repositories yum repolist Fixing duplicate packages Install yum utils yum install yum-utils check for and list duplicates package-cleanup --dupes remove duplicates package-cleanup --cleandupes Check for any problems with the yum database package-cleanup --problems
